news.title: Trump signals escalation in Israel-Iran conflict as he leaves G7 summit early
news.summary: The conflict prompted a statement from G7 leaders, affirming support for Israel. The statement also called for a resolution to the escalating tensions in the Middle East.

news.title: JPMorgan Chase unveils new Sapphire Reserve card perks and $795 annual fee
news.summary: JPMorgan, the biggest U.S. bank by assets, shook up the card industry with the launch of the Sapphire Reserve almost a decade ago.

news.title: JetBlue to cut more flights, other costs with break-even 2025 'unlikely' due to weaker travel demand
news.summary: JetBlue CEO Joanna Geraghty told staff the carrier is further cutting costs. softer travel demand makes breakeven operating margins in 2025 unlikely.

news.title: Trump's $499 smartphone will likely be made in China
news.summary: The Trump Organization's newly-announced T1 smartphone will likely be made in China, experts said. This is despite claims the device will be manufactured in the U.S.

news.title: Retail sales fell 0.9% in May, worse than expected as consumers pulled back
news.summary: Consumers spending pulled back sharply, weighed by declining gas sales and looming unease over where the economy is headed. Consumers spent less on cars, clothes, electronics, furniture and other items.

news.title: This five-star fund manager says even smart investors have been missing the greatest theme of our time
news.summary: Patrick Kelly, co-manager of a top-performing Alger fund, wants investors to wake up over AI before they miss a big opportunity.

news.title: Shoppers cut spending at retailers in May. Trade wars still a drag on the economy.
news.summary: The latest snapshot of retail sales in May underscores the threat to U.S. growth. Simmering trade wars have created a sort of stop-and-start economy.

news.title: As Chase Sapphire Reserve raises fees to almost $800, is a $1,000-a-year premium credit card in sight?
news.summary: The revamped American Express Platinum card teased this week is also expected to hike fees, experts say. The new card is expected to go on sale later this year.

news.title: My son, 39, will be released from prison in 2030. Do I leave him my $100K life insurance?
news.summary: “I am concerned about leaving a large sum of cash to a drug user,” she says. “I’m concerned about people using the money to buy drugs.”

news.title: This one-and-done heart-disease treatment just got a $1.3 billion endorsement from Eli Lilly
news.summary: Verve Therapeutics’ stock rallies by a record 80% on Eli Lilly’s premium purchase price for the drug-development company.
